article.title: Bell Boeing Team Awarded Contract for Next Phase of V-22 Osprey Support
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: The Bell Boeing Program Office has been awarded Phase 1.5 of a two-phase Joint Performance Based Logistics contract from the U.S. Defense Department to support the V-22 Osprey tiltrotor aircraft for the U.S. Marine Corps and Air Force Special Operations Command. The contract is valued at $11 million.
